lines.text: Well, this *is* a surprise! That's a pretty old line, but it seems to fit.
Johnny never takes anything seriously, running about the country, getting married here, there, and the other place.
Oh, come now, I only got married once.
Nicko, I'm going to talk mighty fast and blunt

You wanted Johnny, I got him. Knowing your high standards of sportsmanship, is no surprise to me that you are a bad loser. You'd like Johnny's family to believe a lot of dirty gossip about me and Gene Fairchild. I'm warning you to shut up and take your loss like the lady you're not.
